text: Lasiodermini is a tribe of death-watch and spider beetles in the family Ptinidae. There are at least 3 genera and 30 described species in Lasiodermini. ==Genera== These three genera belong to the tribe Lasiodermini: * Lasioderma Stephens, 1835 * Megorama Fall, 1905 * Pseudolasioderma Logvinovskiy, 1978 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:Ptinidae
title: Lasiodermini
